DOC.brief_summary: This post-marketing surveillance (PMS) is conducted to collect safety and efficacy data among subjects with chronic hepatitis B and hepatic cirrhosis B who is treated with adefovir tablets.
DOC.brief_title: Drug Use Investigation for HEPSERA (Adefovir) Tablet
DOC.criteria: Subjects with chronic hepatitis B or hepatic cirrhosis B Subjects treated with adefovir tablets
